recommendations.item_metadata: [{"category":["CDs & Vinyl","Jazz"],"description":["Born in Chicago in 1935, Ramsey Emmanuel Lewis Jr., was already taking piano lessons at the age of four. At 15 he joined his first jazz band, The Cleffs, and later formed the Ramsey Lewis Trio with two other members, drummer Isaac ""Redd"" Holt and bassist Eldee Young. The Trio would go on to record 25 albums together by which time, the mid 1960s, they were not just one of the hottest Jazz outfits in the USA but were equally known on the pop charts as crossover singles such as 'Wade In The Water', 'The In Crowd' and 'Hang On Sloopy' all went top 10. Young and Holt left Ramsey around this time to form their own Young Holt Unlimited, while Lewis continued to bring in superlative jazz men such as drummer\/vocalist Maurice White (later to form Earth, Wind and Fire) to back him on numerous further records, film soundtracks and in performance. This compilation features Ramsey Lewis' complete recorded output from his first album, 1956's Ramsey Lewis & His Gentle-men of Swing, through to 1960 and An Hour with the Ramsey Lewis Trio. The selection here includes eight complete albums originally released through this golden age for Jazz in general, and Ramsey Lewis in particular, including as it does collaborations with other jazz giants such as Jimmy Woods, Max Roach and Lorez Alexandria."],"title":"Complete Recordings: 1957-1960","brand":"Ramsey Lewis","rank":"223,739 in CDs & Vinyl (","asin":"B00IC13TMK","imageURLHighRes":["https:\/\/images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/51fOBfb4dxL.jpg"],"details":{"Audio CD":"(May 6, 2014)","Original Release Date:":"May 6, 2014","Number of Discs:":"4","Label:":"Enlightenment","ASIN:":"B00IC13TMK"}}]

After 13 volumes already, Buddha bar Djs kept on travelling the world searching for the next hit, the next artist that deserves to be called one, pushing their limits making us dream and travel. This time, destination Bollywood !"],"title":"Buddha Bar XIV","brand":"Various Artists","rank":"170,703 in CDs & Vinyl (","asin":"B007DKN01G","imageURLHighRes":["https:\/\/images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/51Gvimtcg1L.jpg"],"details":{"Audio CD":"(May 1, 2012)","Number of Discs:":"2","Label:":"George V France","ASIN:":"B007DKN01G"}}]

[{"category":["CDs & Vinyl","New Age","Healing"],"description":["InMagical Healing Mantras, twenty-five musicians unite from around the world and blend their voices, guitars, flutes, sitars, tablas and a tarang to create a memorable East-West musical fusion that is both exotic and familiar. Includes the Gayatri Mantra. An ancient Hindu technique suggests repeating a mantra in 108 successions for 40 days to secure the mantras vibration in the body. If any of the days are missed, it is important to start again at the beginning of the 40 day period. Much has been written about the power of thought on action. A mantra is devotional and, therefore, inspired. Each mantra has a specific purpose to serve a higher ideal. If the intention serves this ideal and the universe, a profound and positive change can occur within the individual. There are some general techniques that facilitate the practice of using mantras. Find or create a sacred place to chant. Experiment with different times of the day. Use candles or incense to enhance the ceremonial atmosphere.Take a few deep breaths and dispel any negativity that might interfere with focusing.","Namaste is a group of 25 musicians from around the world that came together to create a collection of mantras dedicated to the vision of Indian spiritual teacher Osho, who taught philosophy in his homeland before coming to the west to give instruction in meditation and other transformational practices. The result is Magical Healing Mantras, a soothing and nourishing album of Indian devotional chants. --Damon Orion, Massage Magazine"],"title":"Magical Healing Mantras","brand":"Namaste","rank":"101,931 in CDs & Vinyl (","asin":"B00004SGT4","imageURLHighRes":["https:\/\/images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/51Jc30Fc1iL.jpg"],"details":{"Audio CD":"(November 14, 2000)","Original Release Date:":"November 14, 2000","Number of Discs:":"1","Label:":"New Earth Records","ASIN:":"B00004SGT4"}},{"category":["CDs & Vinyl","New Age","Healing"],"description":["InMagical Healing Mantras, twenty-five musicians unite from around the world and blend their voices, guitars, flutes, sitars, tablas and a tarang to create a memorable East-West musical fusion that is both exotic and familiar. Includes the Gayatri Mantra. An ancient Hindu technique suggests repeating a mantra in 108 successions for 40 days to secure the mantras vibration in the body. If any of the days are missed, it is important to start again at the beginning of the 40 day period. Much has been written about the power of thought on action. A mantra is devotional and, therefore, inspired. Each mantra has a specific purpose to serve a higher ideal. If the intention serves this ideal and the universe, a profound and positive change can occur within the individual. There are some general techniques that facilitate the practice of using mantras. Find or create a sacred place to chant. Experiment with different times of the day. Use candles or incense to enhance the ceremonial atmosphere.Take a few deep breaths and dispel any negativity that might interfere with focusing.","Namaste is a group of 25 musicians from around the world that came together to create a collection of mantras dedicated to the vision of Indian spiritual teacher Osho, who taught philosophy in his homeland before coming to the west to give instruction in meditation and other transformational practices. The result is Magical Healing Mantras, a soothing and nourishing album of Indian devotional chants. --Damon Orion, Massage Magazine"],"title":"Magical Healing Mantras","brand":"Namaste","rank":"101,931 in CDs & Vinyl (","asin":"B00004SGT4","imageURLHighRes":["https:\/\/images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/51Jc30Fc1iL.jpg"],"details":{"Audio CD":"(November 14, 2000)","Original Release Date:":"November 14, 2000","Number of Discs:":"1","Label:":"New Earth Records","ASIN:":"B00004SGT4"}}]
